mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_NO, USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_PHONE, USER_NAME , USER_BIRTH, GENDER, CITY ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{phone}, #{userName}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{address} )
mapper.select: select USER_NO, USER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{uesrId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPORTINFO( STYLE, SKILL, USER_NO, CATEGORY_NUM ) VALUES ( #{style}, #{skill}, #{userNo}, #{categoryNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_PHONE, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, GENDER, CITY, USER_POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and USER_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SPORT_LEVEL, SPORT_SCORE, SPORT_COUNT, SPORT_COUNT, STYLE, SKILL, USER_NO, CATEGORY_NUM FROM SPORTINFO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CATEGORY_NUM = #{categoryNum}
